items.abstract: <jats:p>This article show us about vocation according to Saint John Paul II. Pope said that every peoplehas another vocation. Everyone has not the same vocation. One of us has vocation to priesthood,another to marriage. No matter which vocation we have, all of us should aspire to holiness. Weshould realize our vocation, in our daily life.</jats:p>
